headline.main: FIFA's Blatter Promises to Root Out Any Wrongdoing
headline.print_headline: FIFA's Blatter Promises to Root Out Any Wrongdoing

docs.snippet: FIFA chief Sepp Blatter said he was determined to "root out any wrongdoing in football" after seven leading football officials were arrested on corruption charges by U.S. and Swiss authorities on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA chief Sepp Blatter said he was determined to "root out any wrongdoing in football" after seven leading football officials were arrested on corruption charges by U.S. and Swiss authorities on Wednesday.

headline.main: Ukraine Must Keep Up Fight Against Corruption: Biden
headline.print_headline: Ukraine Must Keep Up Fight Against Corruption: Biden

docs.snippet: Ukraine's government needs to investigate and prosecute corruption at all levels and implement difficult political reforms to retain the support of the United States, U.S. Vice President Joe Biden said on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ukraine's government needs to investigate and prosecute corruption at all levels and implement difficult political reforms to retain the support of the United States, U.S. Vice President Joe Biden said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Wisconsin Bill Would Approve Blaze Pink Wear for Hunting
headline.print_headline: Wisconsin Bill Would Approve Blaze Pink Wear for Hunting

headline.main: FIFA's Commercial Partners Urged to Make Their Voices Heard
headline.print_headline: FIFA's Commercial Partners Urged to Make Their Voices Heard

docs.snippet: FIFA's sponsorship paymasters are facing mounting calls to put pressure on soccer's global governing body to clean up its act — and fast — following Wednesday's arrest of seven officials....

headline.main: Former Rep. LaTourette Files Claim vs US Over Missed Cancer
headline.print_headline: Former Rep. LaTourette Files Claim vs US Over Missed Cancer

docs.snippet: Former Congressman Steve LaTourette, gravely ill with pancreatic cancer, has filed a claim against the government over the treatment he received from his Capitol doctors. He contends they failed to pass along critical information about a lesion on...
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Congressman Steve LaTourette, gravely ill with pancreatic cancer, has filed a claim against the government over the treatment he received from his Capitol doctors. He contends they failed to pass along critical information about a lesion on the organ and the need for follow-up monitoring.

headline.main: Journalist Who Denounced Drug Trafficking Murdered in Brazil

docs.lead_paragraph: Police say a radio journalist known for denouncing drug traffickers and organized crime groups has been murdered in northeastern Brazil.
